body:
Well, I have reached my goal of 20,000 kills!

Feel free to ask me anything and I'll make sure to reply to all questions!

replies.body:
@Cobalt838 - CrafterPete1013, eZ pZ, <3

@ctdggd - That would clearly get me accepted. :3

@Epicraft321 - yes, cows. >:D

@dominate711 - rap, basketball, peaches, ACTION MOVIES (basically all I watch), I don't watch any TV shows. :P

@Epicraft321 (2) - I cri. :'c

@vsplesk101 I haven't done one for over a month but if you want me to do one, sure!

@cinnamoncroc000 - As much as giraffes can eat.

@diamondporkchop3 - First time I was (big mistake :c), 2nd time I was not.

replies.body:
I also have a couple of questions ...

How many of your kills are legit kills?

You talk often and start topics about how you want to become big in the "Youtube-world", but at the same time you use a hacked client and say Minecraft is boring and you got tired of it.

How do you think you will become "big" if you don't enjoy what you are doing? Do you think there's a possibility of you becoming "big" if you are bored and tired of the only game you play and record?
replies.body_tagged:
